text: Jordan Parks (born 6 April 1994) is an American professional basketball player for Basket Napoli of the Italian Serie A2 Basket. During the 2019-20 season, Parks finished as the second-leading scorer in Serie A2 with Orlandina Basket with 23 points per game. He joined Universo Treviso Basket in 2019 and averaged 8.5 points per game. Parks signed with Basket Napoli on June 27, 2020. ==The Basketball Tournament== Jordan Parks played for DC On Point in the 2018 edition of The Basketball Tournament. He scored 7 points and had 7 rebounds in the team's first-round loss to Armored Athlete. ==References== ==External links== * German BBL profile * ESPN profile * North Carolina Central Eagles bio Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Germany Category:American expatriate basketball people in Italy Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from New York (state) Category:College of Central Florida alumni Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Junior college men's basketball players in the United States Category:Lega Basket Serie A players Category:North Carolina Central Eagles men's basketball players Category:Orlandina Basket players Category:Pallacanestro Treviso players Category:Pallacanestro Trieste players Category:Sportspeople from Staten Island Category:Telekom Baskets Bonn players Category:Universo Treviso Basket players
title: Jordan Parks
